name: Metadata Importer
summary: Learn about .MDIMPORTER files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When a file is changed, Spotlight loads the specific MDIMPORTER file and extracts the metadata.
To see what MDIMPORTER files you have installed go to the Spotlight folder located in the /​System/​Library/​ directory on your Macintosh HD.
NOTE: If a file does not have a MDIMPORTER, it will only be able to be searched for by the file name.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
